[Upgrade quote 185]Fool's biscuit.english: Business. Serious business. This is absolutely all of your business.
[Upgrade quote 185]Fool's biscuit.chinese: 生意。大生意。我们有单大买卖了……

[Upgrade quote 186]Eternal seasons.comment: Season to taste是调味的意思 season又是季节 翻不明白了

[Upgrade quote 187]Kitten managers.english: that's not gonna paws any problem, sir
[Upgrade quote 187]Kitten managers.chinese: 这不会引起什么猫病的，阁下。

[Upgrade quote 189]Octillion fingers.english: Turns out you can quite put your finger on it.
[Upgrade quote 189]Octillion fingers.chinese: 事实证明，你完全可以把你的手指放在上面

[Upgrade quote 190]Eludium mouse.comment: rodent是啮齿类动物，lx翻译的还行我觉得
[Upgrade quote 190]Eludium mouse.english: I rodent do that if I were you.

[Upgrade quote 191]Wishalloy mouse.english: Clicking is fine and dandy, but don't smash your mouse over it. Get your game on. Go play.
[Upgrade quote 191]Wishalloy mouse.chinese: 点击固然很好，但是不要把鼠标寿命砸进去，就保持游戏开着，这样玩吧。

[Upgrade quote 192]Aging agents.english: Counter-intuitively, grandmas have the uncanny ability to become more powerful the older they get.
[Upgrade quote 192]Aging agents.chinese: 与直觉相反,奶奶们有一种不可思议的能力,她们随着年龄的增长而变得更加强大。

[Upgrade quote 193]Pulsar sprinklers.english: There's no such thing as over-watering. The moistest is the bestest.
[Upgrade quote 193]Pulsar sprinklers.chinese: 没有“浇水过度”这种事，最湿润的就是最好的。

[Upgrade quote 194]Deep-bake process.english: A patented process increasing cookie yield two-fold for the same amount of ingredients. Don't ask how, don't take pictures, and be sure to wear your protective suit.
[Upgrade quote 194]Deep-bake process.chinese: 一种专利工艺，在相同的配料量下，饼干产量提高两倍。不要问怎么做到的，不要拍照，一定要穿上防护服。

[Upgrade quote 195]Coreforge.english: You've finally dug a tunnel down to the Earth's core. It's pretty warm down here.
[Upgrade quote 195]Coreforge.chinese: 你终于挖了一条通向地核的隧道，这里很暖和。

[Upgrade quote 196]Generation ship.english: Built to last, this humongous spacecraft will surely deliver your cookies to the deep ends of space, one day.
[Upgrade quote 196]Generation ship.chinese: 经久耐用，这艘巨大的宇宙飞船肯定会有一天将您的饼干送到太空的最深处。

[Upgrade quote 197]Origin crucible.english: Built from the rarest of earths and located at the very deepest of the largest mountain, this legendary crucible is said to retain properties from the big-bang itself.
[Upgrade quote 197]Origin crucible.chinese: 这座传奇的坩埚由地球上最稀有的材料建造而成，它位于最高大的山脉最深处，据说它保留了大爆炸的特性。

[Upgrade quote 198]Deity-sized portals.english: It's almost like, say, an elder god could fit through this thing now. Hypothetically.
[Upgrade quote 198]Deity-sized portals.chinese: 这几乎就是，呃……连古神都可以通过了，只是打个比方。

[Upgrade quote 199]Far future enactment.english: The far future enactment authorizes you to delve deep into the future - where civilization has fallen and risen again, and cookies are plentiful.
[Upgrade quote 199]Far future enactment.chinese: 《未来法案》授权你深入研究未来 —— 未来的文明兴衰交替，重要的是有富饶的饼干。

[Upgrade quote 200]Nanocosmics.english:
The theory of nanocosmics posits that each subatomic particle is in fact its own self-contained universe, holding unfathomable amounts of energy.
This somehow stacks with the nested universe theory, because physics.
[Upgrade quote 200]Nanocosmics.chinese:
纳米宇宙理论假定每个亚原子粒子实际上都是一个独立的宇宙，拥有深不可测的能量。
这在某种程度上可以与嵌套宇宙论同时成立，毕竟物理学。

[Upgrade quote 201]Glow-in-the-dark.english: Your prisms now glow in the dark, effectively doubling their output!
[Upgrade quote 201]Glow-in-the-dark.chinese: 你的棱镜现在可以在黑暗中发光，有效地使它们的输出增加一倍。

[Upgrade quote 202]Rose macarons.english: Although an odd flavor, these pastries recently rose in popularity.
[Upgrade quote 202]Rose macarons.chinese: 虽然味道很奇怪，但这些糕点最近越来越受欢迎。

[Upgrade quote 204]Chocolate macarons.chinese: 它们就像小小的含糖汉堡！

[Upgrade quote 205]Pistachio macarons.english: Pistachio shells now removed after multiple complaints.
[Upgrade quote 205]Pistachio macarons.chinese: 在多次投诉后，开心果的壳现已被移除。

[Upgrade quote 206]Hazelnut macarons.english: These go especially well with coffee.
[Upgrade quote 206]Hazelnut macarons.chinese: 这些特别适合搭配咖啡。

[Upgrade quote 207]Violet macarons.english: It's like spraying perfume into your mouth!
[Upgrade quote 207]Violet macarons.chinese: 就像往嘴里喷香水一样！

[Upgrade quote 208]Magic shenanigans.english:
It's magic. I ain't gotta explain sh
t.
[Upgrade quote 208]Magic shenanigans.chinese:
这是魔法。 我他
的不想解释。

[Upgrade quote 209]Bunny biscuit.english:
All the world will be your enemy
and when they catch you,
they will kill you...
but first they must catch you.
[Upgrade quote 209]Bunny biscuit.chinese:
全世界都将是你的敌人，当他们抓住你时
他们会杀了你……
但首先他们必须抓住你。

[Upgrade quote 210]Chicken egg.english: The egg. The egg came first. Get over it.
[Upgrade quote 210]Chicken egg.chinese: 鸡蛋。第一个找到的蛋，继续找吧。

[Upgrade quote 212]Turkey egg.english: These hatch into strange, hand-shaped creatures.
[Upgrade quote 212]Turkey egg.chinese: 这些东西会孵化成奇怪的、手形的生物。

[Upgrade quote 213]Quail egg.english: These eggs are positively tiny. I mean look at them. How does this happen? Whose idea was that?
[Upgrade quote 213]Quail egg.chinese: 这些蛋确实很小。我的意思是看看他们。这是怎么发生的？那是谁的主意？

[Upgrade quote 214]Robin egg.chinese: 神圣的天蓝色带壳胚胎！

[Upgrade quote 215]Ostrich egg.english:
One of the largest eggs in the world. More like ostrouch, am I right?
Guys?
[Upgrade quote 215]Ostrich egg.chinese:
世界上最大的蛋之一。鸟它鸟蛋，你们说是不是？
伙计们？

[Upgrade quote 216]Cassowary egg.english:
The cassowary is taller than you, possesses murderous claws and can easily outrun you.
You'd do well to be casso-wary of them.
[Upgrade quote 216]Cassowary egg.chinese:
鹤鸵比人还高，拥有凶残的爪子，可以轻易地跑过你。
你最好小心它们的禽犯。

[Upgrade quote 217]Salmon roe.english:
Do the impossible, see the invisible.
Roe roe, fight the power?
[Upgrade quote 217]Salmon roe.chinese: 我的鱼子可是突破天际的鱼子啊!

[Upgrade quote 218]Frogspawn.english: I was going to make a pun about how these "toadally look like eyeballs", but froget it.
[Upgrade quote 218]Frogspawn.chinese: 本来还想讲个关于青蛙的笑话，但是我蟾蜍了这个念想。忘了它吧，蛤蛤。

[Upgrade quote 219]Shark egg.english:
HELLO IS THIS FOOD?
LET ME TELL YOU ABOUT FOOD.
WHY DO I KEEP EATING MY FRIENDS
[Upgrade quote 219]Shark egg.chinese:
这是食物吗？
让我告诉你关于食物的事。
让我告诉你为什么我总是吃我的朋友。

[Upgrade quote 220]Turtle egg.english:
Turtles, right? Hatch from shells. Grow into shells. What's up with that?
Now for my skit about airplane food.
[Upgrade quote 220]Turtle egg.chinese:
海龟，对吧？从壳中孵化。长进壳里。那是怎么回事？
现在来看我的关于飞机食品的短剧。

[Upgrade quote 221]Ant larva.english:
These are a delicacy in some countries, I swear. You will let these invade your digestive tract, and you will derive great pleasure from it.
And all will be well.
[Upgrade quote 221]Ant larva.chinese:
我发誓，这些在某些国家是美味佳肴。
感受它们经过你的消化道很有乐趣。
你不会有事的。

[Upgrade quote 222]Golden goose egg.english: The sole vestige of a tragic tale involving misguided investments.
[Upgrade quote 222]Golden goose egg.chinese: 所以你杀了那只会下金蛋的鹅？这交易可不太划算。

[Upgrade quote 223]Faberge egg.english: This outrageous egg is definitely fab.
[Upgrade quote 223]Faberge egg.chinese: 这只令人惊讶的蛋绝对太棒了。

[Upgrade quote 224]Wrinklerspawn.english: Look at this little guy! It's gonna be a big boy someday! Yes it is!
[Upgrade quote 224]Wrinklerspawn.chinese: 看看这个小家伙！他总有一天会变成一个大家伙的！没错！

[Upgrade quote 225]Cookie egg.english:
The shell appears to be chipped.
I wonder what's inside this one!
[Upgrade quote 225]Cookie egg.chinese:
外壳似乎有个缺口。
我想知道这里面是什么！

[Upgrade quote 227]Chocolate egg.english: Laid by the elusive cocoa bird. There's a surprise inside!
[Upgrade quote 227]Chocolate egg.chinese:
难以捉摸的可可鸟下的蛋。
里面有惊喜！

[Upgrade quote 228]Century egg.english: Actually not centuries-old. This one isn't a day over 86!
[Upgrade quote 228]Century egg.chinese: 其实没有百年历史。这只才刚刚86岁！

[Upgrade quote 230]Caramel macarons.english: The saltiest, chewiest of them all.

[Upgrade quote 232]Taller tellers.english: Able to process a higher amount of transactions. Careful though, as taller tellers tell tall tales.
[Upgrade quote 232]Taller tellers.chinese: 让你的出纳员成为一个业务能力更强的高人——但是要小心眼高手低！毕竟他长得有点太高了

[Upgrade quote 233]Scissor-resistant cre.chinese: 给那些真正有价值的客户。

[Upgrade quote 234]Acid-proof vaults.english: You know what they say : better safe than sorry.
[Upgrade quote 234]Acid-proof vaults.chinese: 你知道他们说的：谨言慎行不吃亏，轻率莽撞必后悔。

[Upgrade quote 235]Chocolate coins.english: This revolutionary currency is much easier to melt from and into ingots - and tastes much better, for a change.
[Upgrade quote 235]Chocolate coins.chinese: 这种革命性的货币更容易从铸锭中熔炼出来——而且味道也更好，换换口味。

[Upgrade quote 236]Exponential interest.english: Can't argue with mathematics! Now fork it over.
[Upgrade quote 236]Exponential interest.chinese: 别按你的计算器了！现在去缴税款。

[Upgrade quote 237]Financial zen.english: The ultimate grail of economic thought; the feng shui of big money, the stock market yoga - the Heimlich maneuver of dimes and nickels.
[Upgrade quote 237]Financial zen.chinese: 经济思想的终极圣杯;挣大钱的玄学,股市瑜伽学 - 给钢镚做急救。

[Upgrade quote 238]Golden idols.english: Lure even greedier adventurers to retrieve your cookies. Now that's a real idol game!
[Upgrade quote 238]Golden idols.chinese: 吸引更贪婪的冒险家来取回你的饼干。这才是真正的偶像游戏！

[Upgrade quote 239]Sacrifices.english: What's a life to a gigaton of cookies?

[Upgrade quote 240]Delicious blessing.english: And lo, the Baker's almighty spoon came down and distributed holy gifts unto the believers - shimmering sugar, and chocolate dark as night, and all manner of wheats. And boy let me tell you, that party was mighty gnarly.
[Upgrade quote 240]Delicious blessing.chinese:
看哪，面包师万能的勺子下来，给信徒们分发了神圣的礼物——闪闪发光的糖，
像黑夜一样黑的巧克力，还有各种各样的小麦。
孩子，让我告诉你们，那个聚会很奇妙。

[Upgrade quote 241]Sun festival.english: Free the primordial powers of your temples with these annual celebrations involving fire-breathers, traditional dancing, ritual beheadings and other merriments!
[Upgrade quote 241]Sun festival.chinese: 通过这些涉及喷火、传统舞蹈、仪式斩首和其他欢乐的年度庆祝活动，释放您神庙的原始力量！]

[Upgrade quote 242]Enlarged pantheon.english: Enough spiritual inadequacy! More divinities than you'll ever need, or your money back! 100% guaranteed!
[Upgrade quote 242]Enlarged pantheon.chinese: 受够精神空虚了？这里有比你需要的更多的神，不够包退！童叟无欺！

[Upgrade quote 243]Great Baker in the sk.english: This is it. The ultimate deity has finally cast Their sublimely divine eye upon your operation; whether this is a good thing or possibly the end of days is something you should find out very soon.
[Upgrade quote 243]Great Baker in the sk.chinese: 就是这样。终极之神终于将他们崇高而神圣之眼投向了您的行动；这是一件好事还是可能是末日，你很快就会知道了。

[Upgrade quote 244]Pointier hats.english: Tests have shown increased thaumic receptivity relative to the geometric proportions of wizardly conic implements.
[Upgrade quote 244]Pointier hats.chinese: 测试表明，相对于锥形魔法器具的几何比例，神秘学接受能力有所提高。

[Upgrade quote 245]Beardlier beards.english: Haven't you heard? The beard is the word.

[Upgrade quote 246]Ancient grimoires.english: Contain interesting spells such as "Turn Water To Drool", "Grow Eyebrows On Furniture" and "Summon Politician".
[Upgrade quote 246]Ancient grimoires.chinese: 包含有趣的咒语，例如 "把水变成口水"，"让家具上长眉毛"还有"召唤政治家".

[Upgrade quote 247]Kitchen curses.english: Exotic magic involved in all things pastry-related. Hexcellent!
[Upgrade quote 247]Kitchen curses.chinese: 与糕点相关的所有事物都包含奇异的魔法。太棒了！

[Upgrade quote 248]School of sorcery.english: This cookie-funded academy of witchcraft is home to the 4 prestigious houses of magic : the Jocks, the Nerds, the Preps, and the Deathmunchers.
[Upgrade quote 248]School of sorcery.chinese: 这所由饼干资助的巫师塔是四大著名魔法学院的所在地：运动员、书呆子、预科生和死亡导师。

[Upgrade quote 249]Dark formulas.english: Eldritch forces are at work behind these spells - you get the feeling you really shouldn't be messing with those. But I mean, free cookies, right?
[Upgrade quote 249]Dark formulas.chinese: 咒语背后充满了邪术力量，让你胆战心寒。不过你只在乎饼干，对吧？

[Upgrade quote 250]Banker grandmas.english: A nice banker to cash in more cookies.
[Upgrade quote 250]Banker grandmas.chinese: 一个不错的银行家，可以兑现更多的饼干。

[Upgrade quote 251]Priestess grandmas.english: A nice priestess to praise the one true Baker in the sky.
[Upgrade quote 251]Priestess grandmas.chinese: 一位信仰烘焙之神的女祭司。

[Upgrade quote 252]Witch grandmas.english: A nice witch to cast a zip, and a zoop, and poof! Cookies.
[Upgrade quote 252]Witch grandmas.chinese: 一个可以碰！啪！寄！变出饼干来的好巫婆。

[Upgrade quote 253]Tin of british tea bi.chinese: 任何时间都是下午茶时间。

[Upgrade quote 254]Box of macarons.english:
Multicolored delicacies filled with various kinds of jam.
Not to be confused with macaroons, macaroni, macarena or any of that nonsense.
[Upgrade quote 254]Box of macarons.chinese:
五彩缤纷的美味佳肴，里面装满了各种果酱。
不要与杏仁饼、通心粉、玛卡丽娜或任何无意义的东西混淆。

[Upgrade quote 256]Pure black chocolate.english: Dipped in a lab-made substance darker than the darkest cocoa (dubbed "chocoalate").
[Upgrade quote 256]Pure black chocolate.chinese: 从惨无人道的黑暗实验可可物质中取出...（其名为巧可力！）

[Upgrade quote 257]Pure white chocolate.english: Elaborated on the nano-scale, the coating on this biscuit is able to refract light even in a pitch-black environment.
[Upgrade quote 257]Pure white chocolate.chinese: 在纳米尺度上，这种饼干上的涂层即使在漆黑的环境中也能折射光线。

[Upgrade quote 258]Ladyfingers.english: Cleaned and sanitized so well you'd swear they're actual biscuits.
[Upgrade quote 258]Ladyfingers.chinese: 清洗和消毒得如此之好，你会发誓它们是真正的饼干。

[Upgrade quote 259]Tuiles.english: These never go out of tile.
[Upgrade quote 259]Tuiles.chinese: 这些瓷砖永远不会褪色。

[Upgrade quote 260]Chocolate-stuffed bis.english:
A princely snack!
The holes are so the chocolate stuffing can breathe.
[Upgrade quote 260]Chocolate-stuffed bis.chinese:
一份美味的点心！
这些洞是为了让巧克力夹心可以呼吸。

[Upgrade quote 261]Checker cookies.english: A square cookie? This solves so many storage and packaging problems! You're a genius!
[Upgrade quote 261]Checker cookies.chinese: 一块方形饼干？ 这解决了许多存储和包装问题！ 你是个天才！

[Upgrade quote 262]Butter cookies.english: These melt right off your mouth and into your heart. (Let's face it, they're rather fattening.)
[Upgrade quote 262]Butter cookies.chinese: 这些东西会从你的嘴里融化到你的心里(让我们面对现实吧，它们很容易让你发胖。）

[Upgrade quote 263]Cream cookies.english: It's like two chocolate chip cookies! But brought together with the magic of cream! It's fiendishly perfect!
[Upgrade quote 263]Cream cookies.chinese: 就像两块巧克力饼干！但与奶油的魔力结合在一起！真是太完美了！

[Upgrade quote 274]Angels.english: Lowest-ranking at the first sphere of pastry heaven, angels are tasked with delivering new recipes to the mortals they deem worthy.
[Upgrade quote 274]Angels.chinese: 在糕点天堂的第一界，天使们的任务是为他们认为有价值的凡人提供新的食谱。

[Upgrade quote 275]Archangels.english: Members of the first sphere of pastry heaven, archangels are responsible for the smooth functioning of the world's largest bakeries.
[Upgrade quote 275]Archangels.chinese: 作为糕点天堂第一界的成员，大天使们负责世界上最大的面包店的顺利运作。

[Upgrade quote 276]Virtues.english: Found at the second sphere of pastry heaven, virtues make use of their heavenly strength to push and drag the stars of the cosmos.
[Upgrade quote 276]Virtues.chinese: 位于糕点天堂的第二界，力天使利用他们的天力来推拉宇宙的星辰。

[Upgrade quote 277]Dominions.english: Ruling over the second sphere of pastry heaven, dominions hold a managerial position and are in charge of accounting and regulating schedules.
[Upgrade quote 277]Dominions.chinese: 作为糕点天堂的第二界之主，主天使占据着管理地位，负责会计和管理日程。

[Upgrade quote 278]Cherubim.english: Sieging at the first sphere of pastry heaven, the four-faced cherubim serve as heavenly bouncers and bodyguards.
[Upgrade quote 278]Cherubim.chinese: 智天使环绕着糕点天堂的第一界，担任天堂的守护者。

[Upgrade quote 279]Seraphim.english: Leading the first sphere of pastry heaven, seraphim possess ultimate knowledge of everything pertaining to baking.
[Upgrade quote 279]Seraphim.chinese: 领导糕点天堂的第一界，六翼天使拥有与烘焙有关的一切终极知识。

[Upgrade quote 280]God.chinese: 就像圣诞老人，但没那么有趣。

[Upgrade quote 281]Twin Gates of Transce.english: This is one occasion you're always underdressed for. Don't worry, just rush in past the bouncer and pretend you know people.
[Upgrade quote 281]Twin Gates of Transce.chinese: 这是一个你总是穿着不得体的场合。别担心，从保镖身边冲过去，假装你认识人。

[Upgrade quote 282]Heavenly luck.chinese: 你得到了来自天界的赏识。

[Upgrade quote 283]Lasting fortune.english: This isn't your average everyday luck. This is... advanced luck.
[Upgrade quote 283]Lasting fortune.chinese: 这不是你的普通运气。这是……高级运气。

[Upgrade quote 284]Decisive fate.english: Life just got a bit more intense.
[Upgrade quote 284]Decisive fate.chinese: 生活只是变得更加激烈。

[Upgrade quote 285]Divine discount.english: Someone special deserves a special price.
[Upgrade quote 285]Divine discount.chinese: 特别的人值得特别的价格。

[Upgrade quote 287]Divine bakeries.english: They sure know what they're doing.
[Upgrade quote 287]Divine bakeries.chinese: 他们肯定知道自己在做什么。

[Upgrade quote 292]Unholy bait.english: No wrinkler can resist the scent of worm biscuits.
[Upgrade quote 292]Unholy bait.chinese: 没有哪种饼干虫能抵抗蠕虫饼干的气味。

[Upgrade quote 293]Sacrilegious corrupti.english: Unique in the animal kingdom, the wrinkler digestive tract is able to withstand an incredible degree of dilation - provided you prod them appropriately.
[Upgrade quote 293]Sacrilegious corrupti.chinese: 在动物界是独一无二的，饼干虫的消化道能够承受难以置信的扩张——只要你适当地刺激它们。

[Upgrade quote 294]Xtreme walkers.english: Complete with flame decals and a little horn that goes "toot".
[Upgrade quote 294]Xtreme walkers.chinese: 配有火焰贴纸和一个小喇叭，喇叭可以发出“嘟嘟”声。

[Upgrade quote 295]Fudge fungus.english:
A sugary parasite whose tendrils help cookie growth.
Please do not breathe in the spores. In case of spore ingestion, seek medical help within the next 36 seconds.
[Upgrade quote 295]Fudge fungus.chinese:
一种含糖寄生虫，其卷须有助于饼干生长。
请不要吸入孢子。 如果不慎摄入，请在接下来的 36 秒内寻求医疗帮助。

[Upgrade quote 296]Planetsplitters.english: These new state-of-the-art excavators have been tested on Merula, Globort and Flwanza VI, among other distant planets which have been curiously quiet lately.
[Upgrade quote 296]Planetsplitters.chinese: 这些最先进的新型挖掘机已经在 Merula、Globort 和 Flwanza VI 以及其他最近异常安静的遥远行星上进行了测试。

[Upgrade quote 297]Cyborg workforce.english: Semi-synthetic organisms don't slack off, don't unionize, and have 20% shorter lunch breaks, making them ideal labor fodder.
[Upgrade quote 297]Cyborg workforce.chinese: 半合成生物体不会懈怠，不会成立工会，午餐休息时间缩短20%，使它们成为理想的打工人。

[Upgrade quote 298]Way of the wallet.english: This new monetary school of thought is all the rage on the banking scene; follow its precepts and you may just profit from it.
[Upgrade quote 298]Way of the wallet.chinese: 这种新的货币学派在银行业风靡一时。遵循它的规律，你可能会从中受益。

[Upgrade quote 299]Creation myth.english: Stories have been circulating about the origins of the very first cookie that was ever baked; tales of how it all began, in the Dough beyond time and the Ovens of destiny.
[Upgrade quote 299]Creation myth.chinese: 关于有史以来第一个烘焙饼干的起源的故事一直在流传。 关于这一切如何开始的故事，在超越时间的面团和命运的烤箱中。
